fr.description: User's audio record as publisher on M+. Add field like this one for each language provided. When no language is defined, just create the 'fr' field

id.description: Audio file's id in the flystore/files table

key.description: Audio file's key in the flystore/files table

followers: Just provide empty square braces as value
following: Just provide empty square braces as value
likes: Just provide empty square braces as value
notes: Just provide empty square braces as value
